objects.name: Analytic 1450
objects.description: Remote knock sequence followed by PF/socketfilterfw rule update or a background process listening on a new port; then a successful TCP session. Also flags WoL magic packets on local segment.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: exec: Execution of /sbin/pfctl, /usr/libexec/ApplicationFirewall/socketfilterfw, ifconfig, tcpdump, npcap/libpcap consumers

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Firewall rule enable/disable or listen socket changes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Closed-port hits followed by success from same src_ip

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Anchors or conf files monitored for change (/etc/pf.conf, /etc/pf.anchors/*).
Reduce noise on dev endpoints compiling or testing PF rules.
